TextBlock.Text: SACCO: So on this planet, they were using the corpses as an energy source to build cannons and steal things from other planets?
MENTH: I see. Perhaps, hypothesis: they salvaged the warp technology from our Vessel and the escape pod, which is why we're stuck in this system.
CUMIN: What the heck! Then we'll never be able to get out of here!
MENTH: Don't worry! Our Vessel has a spare warp core. And I just heard from our supervisor that it's working fine. So we'll leave the system as soon as we finish investigating this planet.
MENTH: Well, it was only after your Vessel was gone that a spare warp core became recommended, Escall.
